setattribute.xpath: //block[starts-with(@name, 'terr') and not(contains(@name, 'Asphalt')) and not(contains(@name, 'Concrete')) and not(contains(@name, 'terrOre')) and not(contains(@name, 'Destroyed')) and not(contains(@name, 'Filler')) and not(contains(@name, 'Stone')) and not(contains(@name, 'rock')) and not(contains(@name, 'Water'))]/drop[@event='Harvest' and @name='resourceCrushedSand' and @tag='oreWoodHarvest']
setattribute.name: tag

setattribute.xpath: //block[starts-with(@name, 'terr') and not(contains(@name, 'Asphalt')) and not(contains(@name, 'Concrete')) and not(contains(@name, 'terrOre')) and not(contains(@name, 'Destroyed')) and not(contains(@name, 'Filler')) and not(contains(@name, 'Stone')) and not(contains(@name, 'rock')) and not(contains(@name, 'Water'))]/drop[@event='Harvest' and @name='resourceClayLump' and @tag='oreWoodHarvest']
setattribute.name: tag
